name: srp-developer
description: SRP开发者插件 - 扩展allstaff功能，增加GitHub集成、GCP开发者访问等开发工具

srp:github.description: GitHub integration for code review and PR management (GitHub集成)

srp:gh.description: Quick alias for GitHub integration (GitHub快捷命令)

srp:gcp.description: GCP access for developers - BigQuery and data analysis (GCP开发者访问)

srp:bq.description: Quick alias for BigQuery access (BigQuery快捷命令)
